# Ignore node_modules directory
node_modules/

# Ignore environment variables file
.env

# Ignore logs and other files generated by the server
logs/
*.log

# Ignore build artifacts
build/
dist/
coverage/

# Ignore editor/IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/

# Ignore dependency lock files
package-lock.json
yarn.lock

# Ignore user-specific files
.DS_Store
